Package arcade.core.util

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.util.Graph
  • public final class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Container class for directed graph using nodes as hashes.

    Edge objects represent edges in the graph and Node objects represent nodes in the graph. Nodes may have more than one edge in or out.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Graph.Edge
      Nested class representing a graph edge.
      static interface  Graph.GraphFilter
      Defines a filter for edges in a graph.
      static class  Graph.Node
      Nested class representing a graph node.
      static class  Graph.Strategy
      Calculation strategies.

      private java.util.Map<Graph.Node,​sim.util.Bag> nodeToOutBag

      • getSubgraph

        public void getSubgraph​(Graph g,
                        Graph.GraphFilter f)
        Filters this graph for edges and copies them to the given graph object.

        Notes that the links in the subgraph are not correct.

        Parameters:
        g - the graph to add filtered edges to
        f - the edge filter

      • findIntersection

        private Graph.Node findIntersection​(Graph.Edge edge1,
                                    Graph.Edge edge2,
                                    Graph.Strategy strategy)
        Find the first node where two edges intersect based on a calulcation strategy (upstream or downstream).
        Parameters:
        edge1 - first edge to start from
        edge2 - second edge to start from
        strategy - the direction to search
        Returns:
        the intersection node or null if no intersection

      • getConnectedNodes

        private sim.util.Bag getConnectedNodes​(Graph.Node node,
                                       Graph.Strategy strategy)
        Get all nodes connected to the given node based on a calculation strategy (e.g. upstream or downstream).
        Parameters:
        node - the node to start from
        strategy - the direction to search
        Returns:
        a bag of connected nodes

      • breadthFirstSearch

        private Graph.Node breadthFirstSearch​(Graph.Node node,
                                      sim.util.Bag targetNodes,
                                      Graph.Strategy strategy)
        Breadth first search from node according to strategy for a subset of target nodes.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to start from
        targetNodes - the bag of potential intersection nodes
        strategy - the direction to search
        Returns:
        the target node or null if not found
